animeDescription: Ken, Joe, and Akira, three high school students, must combine their three mecha into Gekiganger III to defeat the evil Prince Akara and Emperor Hyperion. The OAV is a compilation of the scenes from Nadesico, a new "movie", and is a parody of many mecha series from the 80s.   (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Sasaki Isao', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nagai Go', ['Creator']], ['Satou Tatsuo', ['Original Creator']], ['Gotou Keiji', ['Animation Director', 'Character Design']]]
